    • Covid World Data

    Covid World Data

    Source: vignettes/covid.Rmd
    covid.Rmd

    The app is simple to launch.

    The app helps users to interact and help explore covid-19 cases in Asia. The app also reflects of other underlying factors that might be contributing to the pandemic indefinitely.

    library(covidham)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)

# variables in the data set


glimpse(covid_data)

# although the app wraps around asian countries, the dataset contains data on the whole world

covid_data %>% filter(continent == "Europe") %>% 
  select(location, 
         date, 
         stringency_index) %>% tibble() 
#> # A tibble: 12,527 x 3
#>    location date       stringency_index
#>    <chr>    <chr>                 <dbl>
#>  1 Albania  2020-03-09             36.1
#>  2 Albania  2020-03-10             41.7
#>  3 Albania  2020-03-11             51.8
#>  4 Albania  2020-03-12             51.8
#>  5 Albania  2020-03-13             78.7
#>  6 Albania  2020-03-14             78.7
#>  7 Albania  2020-03-15             81.5
#>  8 Albania  2020-03-16             81.5
#>  9 Albania  2020-03-17             81.5
#> 10 Albania  2020-03-18             81.5
#> # … with 12,517 more rows

    Use the stringency function to get the asian countries stringency index plot.

    stringency()

    To launch the app use the function

    launch_app()
